Package me.masstrix.eternalnature.player

Interface OrderedFormat.TagFormatter

  • Enclosing class:
    OrderedFormat
    public static interface OrderedFormat.TagFormatter
    This is a basic utility helper for OrderedFormat for storing tags. When a format is being created the getText() is called for getting either the modern or legacy text for the tag.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[] asJson()  
      default java.lang.String asLegacy()  
      default boolean copyFormattingToNextComponent()
      Sets if the tags formatting should be copied to the following component.
      Pair<net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[],​java.lang.String> getText()
      Returns a combination of both modern components for json text and legacy text.

    • Method Detail

      • getText

        Pair<net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[],​java.lang.String> getText()
        Returns a combination of both modern components for json text and legacy text. Both should be utilized is using both but null is also accepted in either of the elements.
        Returns:
        the text elements for this tag.

      • asJson

        default net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[] asJson()
        Returns:
        the modern components for this tag.

      • asLegacy

        default java.lang.String asLegacy()
        Returns:
        the legacy text for this tag.

      • copyFormattingToNextComponent

        default boolean copyFormattingToNextComponent()
        Sets if the tags formatting should be copied to the following component. If this is enabled, the next following element will share the same formatting such as color, if it's bold, italic etc.
        Returns:
        if the following component should share the same formatting.
